sentences: Instant Funk came out of Trenton, New Jersey consisting of Raymond Earl, drummer Scotty Miller and guitarist Kim Miller.
The remix of this song by club DJ Larry Levan and engineer Bob Blank quickly became the talk of Manhattan.
Scotty Miller (born Steven Scott Miller on August 22, 1951 in Trenton, New Jersey) died on April 11, 2017, at the age of 65.
